org.opendaylight.controller.forwarding.staticrouting.internal

Class StaticRoutingImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.forwarding.staticrouting.internal.StaticRoutingImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationAwareCommon, IConfigurationContainerAware, IForwardingStaticRouting, IfNewHostNotify, IObjectReader

    public class StaticRoutingImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IfNewHostNotify, IForwardingStaticRouting, IObjectReader, IConfigurationContainerAware
    Static Routing feature provides the bridge between SDN and Non-SDN networks.
